alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Garza; Lubbock; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 7:14PM CDT until June 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Lynn County in northwestern Texas... Northwestern Garza County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Crosby County in northwestern Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 714 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Slaton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Slaton, Caprock and Southland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
